short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Digital Post-it Notes for Website Projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sifta is the best way to manage communication between stakeholders and developers, while building or changing websites or web apps.

Drop digital post-it notes directly on the things you want changed.  Simply hover and click to create a task.  Add details, include a screenshot, draw on the screenshot.  

The task is automatically created in your project management app (currently we support Jira, Trello or Asana).

All notes appear in a virtual layer on top of the website/web app.  So the whole team can see what is being worked on, who is responsible, and the current status.

Of course, for customer facing websites, this is all invisible for users without the Browser Extension.  

Free for up to 2 users

https://getsifta.com
